title: Address details
pageHeader: What is your contact or home address?
pageText: We'll send any correspondence to this address.
enterAddressManually: I don't live in the UK
cannotFindAddress: I cannot find my address in the list
postcodeErrorText: Enter a postcode. For example, SW1 1AA

address1.required: Enter the first line of your contact or home address - up to 100 characters
address1.invalid: Enter the first line of your contact or home address - up to 100 characters

address2.required: Enter the second line of your contact or home address - up to 50 characters
address2.invalid: Enter the second line of your contact or home address - up to 50 characters

addressTown.required: Enter a town or city for your contact or home address - up to 50 characters
addressTown.invalid: Enter a town or city for your contact or home address - up to 50 characters

addressCountry.required: Enter a Country for your contact or home address - up to 50 characters
addressCountry.invalid: Enter a Country for your contact or home address - up to 50 characters

addressPostcode.required: Enter a postcode. For example, SW1 1AA
addressPostcode.invalid: Enter a valid postcode. For example, SW1 1AA
